ygData.subject: Re: Slashing weapons for bards question....
ygData.msgSnippet: Obsidian shard is 6/25 and Dragoon dirk is 6/23. Thex Luteslinger (Tunare) 38th level bard ... __________________________________________________ Do You
ygData.messageBody:
Obsidian shard is 6/25 and Dragoon dirk is 6/23.

Thex Luteslinger (Tunare)
38th level bard

>
> Yep, I'm using obsidian shard and dragoon dirk.
>
> OS is I think 6/23 with a 30 dd proc
> DD is 6/21? with bonuses to dex, MR
> The a runed bone fork in ranged slot, I think that's
> piercing also, but like
> 9/38, so it just stays in ranged slot.
>
> And yes, weapon delays of low 20s, with an enchanter
> speedup, we're blinding
> fast :)
>
> Bien - Karana
